TABLE.NAME: course_category_backedup
TABLE.COMMENT: This table helps keep tracking of the courses already backed up in case something fails.

FIELD.NAME: category_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The category id from which the course was backed up.

FIELD.NAME: category_short_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The short name for the category where the course is/was in when backed up.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The course id for which this backup was created.

FIELD.NAME: task_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The task id associated with this course backup.

FIELD.NAME: course_short_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The short name for the course backed up.

FIELD.NAME: file_path
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the name of the backup file which was created by the backup tool.

FIELD.NAME: processed
FIELD.COMMENT: This field indicates if this particular course for this particular task have been processed or not.

FIELD.NAME: created_date
FIELD.COMMENT: For recording the date and time when this course backup was created.

FIELD.NAME: backed_up_date
FIELD.COMMENT: For recording the date and time when this course backup was exactly executed.

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the id of the user who create this backup.

FIELD.NAME: user_fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the name of the user who create this backup.

INDEX.NAME: ix_course_id_task_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Index for the course id field to facilitate the search on it.

INDEX.NAME: ix_category_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Helps the search of all tasks and courses associated with a particular category be more quickly.

TABLE.NAME: course_category_restored
TABLE.COMMENT: This table supports the process of restored courses for controlling if a particular course has been restored or not.

FIELD.NAME: category_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the category id in which this particular course was restored.

FIELD.NAME: task_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the id of the task where this courses was restored.

FIELD.NAME: course_restored_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the course id assign to this course when it was restored.

FIELD.NAME: file_path
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the path for the file which was used for restore this course. This is just a reference since the physical file could be deleted without the task knowing about it.

FIELD.NAME: restored
FIELD.COMMENT: This field indicates whether or not this course has already been restored.

FIELD.NAME: created_date
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the date/time when this course was restored.

INDEX.NAME: ix_course_id_task_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Helps the search of a category and task be quickly.

INDEX.NAME: ix_category_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Helps the search of all tasks and courses associated with a particular category be more quickly.

TABLE.NAME: course_category_reset
TABLE.COMMENT: This table supports the task for resetting courses from a specify category.

FIELD.NAME: task_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the task id related to the reset of a particular course.

FIELD.NAME: category_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the category id where the course belongs when it was reset.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the course id reset.

FIELD.NAME: reset
FIELD.COMMENT: This fields indicates whether this course has been reset or not.

FIELD.NAME: created_date
FIELD.COMMENT: This fields holds the date/time where this course was add to a reset specific task.

FIELD.NAME: reset_date
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the date/time the course was reset.

INDEX.NAME: ix_course_id_task_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Helps the search of a particular course and task quickly.

INDEX.NAME: ix_category_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Helps the search of all tasks and courses associated with a particular category be more quickly.
